price: آنجا بود که مؤمنان آزمایش شدند و شدیداً به وحشت و اضطراب افتادند.
arabic: هُنَالِكَ ٱبۡتُلِيَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَزُلۡزِلُواْ زِلۡزَالٗا شَدِيدٗا

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hunālika ub'tuliya al-mu'minūna wazul'zilū zil'zālan shadīdan
